main event: Multiple UFO sightings on 24th June 1947 in Portland, Oregon and Cascade Mountains, Washington.
interesting points: Objects were observed to move at tremendous velocities and make sudden changes in direction without any sound.
The observer reported five red disk-shaped objects banking up in the sun and noticed peculiar actions of the compass hand.
Physiological factors could have influenced the observer's report due to prior knowledge of similar sightings.
The objects appeared to have fluctuating reddish bottoms and made no noise, adding to the mystery of the sightings.
Analysis suggests the presence of fantastically large magnetic fields, and the compass action was difficult to explain.
sighted object: round white objects with fluctuating reddish bottoms and disk-shaped objects
location: Portland, Oregon and Cascade Mountains, Washington
